Package Service.UserService

package Service.UserService
User management services.

Handles user lifecycle operations, account statistics, and lookups of user-related data.

Responsibilities

  • Register and unregister users according to business rules.
  • Provide user counts, listings, and derived metrics.
  • Expose read models such as balances and borrowed item summaries.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    Service
    Application service layer orchestrating business use-cases.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddUserService
    Handles the creation and registration of new users in the system.
    GetAllUsersService
    Service for retrieving all users from the database.
    GetUserBalanceService
    Service for retrieving a user's fine balance.
    UnregisterUserService
    Service for handling user unregistration.
    UserBorrowedItemsService
    Service for managing and analyzing a user's borrowed media items.
    UserCountService
    Service for counting users based on their assigned roles.
